channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeff Bezos Isn’t Obligated to Subsidize the Losses of the Washington Post
item.description: Demanding that he act as anything other than a businessman reeks of entitlement.

item.title: Man charged with attempted murder of Trump's budget director Russ Vought
item.description: A Maryland man has been arrested on attempted murder charges against Russ Vought, one of President Trump's top aides.

item.title: Trump launches new discount prescription site as part of affordability push
item.description: President Trump on Thursday launched the Trump Rx website, offering a first-of-its-kind route for patients to buy medicines directly from drugmakers w...

item.title: Is There Any Hope for Reagan’s ‘Informed Patriotism’?
item.description: While civic knowledge and national pride may be on the ropes, they’re not down for the count.

item.title: Republicans call on DOJ to probe four blue states for refusing religious opt-out for kids' vaccines
item.description: Rep. Greg Steube is prodding the Justice Department to investigate four Democrat-led states over allegations that they aren't allowing parents to use ...

item.title: Midnight Strikes for Immigration Restrictionism
item.description: The donors are back in charge of the GOP, for now. But Trump could still turn back the clock with some old-fashioned firings.

item.title: Trump's DOJ promised to fix parent targeting, activists say it's doing the opposite
item.description: There's a growing sense of frustration with the Trump Justice Department among some parental activists who say they had expected a friendlier ear from...

item.title: Solo Mio — a Rom-Com for Men
item.description: Angel Studios launches a family-friendly romance.

item.title: Stalled Battle Against Woke Science Shows Trump Can’t End The Entire Deep State By Himself
item.description: For Trump, the problem at the NSF is the problem in the entire government. Do the agencies carry out the president's directives?

item.title: Census Bureau plans to use survey with a citizenship question in its test for 2030, alarming experts
item.description: The U.S. Census Bureau plans to use a survey form with a citizenship question as part of its practice test of the 2030 census, raising questions about...

item.title: Mike ‘Pick Me’ Pence’s Opposition To The SAVE Act Is Dishonest And Constitutionally Illiterate
item.description: Pence felt the need to slither out of political obscurity to finger wag at people who actually want to safeguard elections against noncitizen voters.

item.title: Is Feminism Compatible With Christianity? Something Wicked Says Absolutely Not
item.description: Something Wicked asks us to take a step back and evaluate an ideology that pursues pure individual autonomy by trampling upon the lives of others.

item.title: Deporting Illegal Aliens Isn’t Complicated. Don’t Let Democrats Complicate It
item.description: It’s useful, if unserious, for congressional Democrat leaders this week to have issued a list of demands in exchange for votes to fund the Department ...

item.title: Supreme Court’s New Anti-Leak Measures Are A Good Start
item.description: The judiciary is essential to the republic, and Chief Justice Roberts has taken an excellent step in safeguarding the hallowed deliberative process.
